remarks: Rewrite the natural transformation predicate with separated functor parts.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
natrcl.1 $e |- N = ( C Nat D ) $.
nat1st2nd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( F N G ) ) $.
nat1st2nd $p |- ( ph -> A e. ( <. ( 1st ` F ) , ( 2nd ` F ) >. N <. ( 1st ` G ) , ( 2nd ` G ) >. ) ) $.
